venue.name: Au Bon Pain at Harvard Square

item.description: Spanning nearly 2300 years, the Dragon Boat Festival transforms old traditions into an exciting sporting and cultural event, right here on the Charles River. Arts and crafts demonstrations. Tasty Asian foods. Free admission. Join us for North America's longest running Dragon Boat Festival!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the bald asian guy in jeans standing by the chess tables outside Au Bon Pain.
item.why: You love it because there is free live performances

group.name: The Cambridge and Boston Singles Meetup

item.name: Boston Dragon Boat Festival
